title: Musiala Pulls the Strings for Bayern
description:
The FC crew react to a dominant performance by Bayern Munich as the club beat Bayer Leverkusen 4-0 and break down what makes Jamal Musiala so effective this season. Plus, the guys argue how big of a statement game this weekend's North London Derby is for Arsenal and react to the surprise news that Christopher Nkunku completed a secret medical ahead of a possible move to Chelsea next summer.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Bayern secure first Bundesliga win in 5 games; Gabriel Jesus on his move from Man City; Nkunku linked with Chelsea
